title: How to Install BBK Power Plus Throttle Body on 2005-2009 Ford Mustang
description: Learn how to install a BBK Throttle Body on a Ford Mustang and unleash extra power instantly. They're the ideal bolt-on mod for Mustangs.
tags: BBK Power Plus Throttle Body, Throttle Body, Ford Mustang

asset.title: Install BBK Power Plus Throttle Body on Ford Mustang - 2005-09 Body
asset.description:
Free Shipping on BBK Throttle Bodies: http://www.autoanything.com/air-intakes/73A4289A0A0.aspx

BBK throttle bodies are an excellent bolt-on modification for Ford Mustangs. Install moderately hard and does require a Digital Multi Meter, so be sure to have all tools necessary before you start.  And installation is very similar for any other Ford vehicle that uses a drive-by-wire throttle body. Make sure to follow these steps very carefully. When all is said and done, your engine should be more responsive and you should be able to feel the extra power your Mustang now makes.

Find more BBK performance parts: http://www.autoanything.com/brands/102A24549.aspx

Want something different? Take a look at all of our Mustang intake components: http://www.autoanything.com/air-intakes/Ford/Mustang/110A50208A0A0A6A60A1.aspx
asset.author: AutoAnything
